summary: This function computes the absolute-value of a number.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # This is the number whose absolute value will be computed. %0A    var i = -5.0 is double;%0A%0A    while (i < 6.0)%0A    {%0A        # This is the absolute value of the number. %0A        val result = F::abs(i);%0A%0A        # Print the result in a nice human-readable format. %0A        F::println (%22abs(%22 .. i .. %22) = %22 .. result);%0A%0A        i = i + 1.0;%0A    }%0A}
